## Question 2 

### part I

Replicate the following matrix in R and call it A.

```{r, comment=NA}
a <- matrix(20:39,4,5, byrow = TRUE)
a

```
```{r, comment=NA}
colnames(a)<-(c('A','B','C','D','E'))
a
```

```{r, comment=NA}
B <- a[c(2,4), c("B", "D")]
B
```

```{r, comment=NA}
t(B)
```

```{r, comment=NA}
B.inverse <- solve(B)
B.inverse
```


```{r, comment=NA}
B2 <- B.inverse%*%B
B2
```

```{r, comment=NA}
df <- mtcars
head(df)

```
